content:
"Expect 145 sites across all the states to receive vaccine on Monday, another 425 sites on Tuesday," said the official in charge of the distribution.

Read more: https://bit.ly/37WoZNH
 
#PfizerBioNTech #COVID19 #vaccine #UnitedStates
date: Americans to receive Pfizer vaccine from MondayAround 3 million people are expected to be vaccinated from the initital rollout Federal health authorities have recommended that health care workers and nursing home residents be the first to get the...opoyi.com
